_comment: Numpad T9 configuration. Edit this file to customize behaviour.
_languages_help: List language codes to load. Multiple languages are merged at runtime.
Each code must match a .txt file in the wordlists/ directory.
Add any language by dropping a matching .txt wordlist into wordlists/.
_wordlist_dir_help: Path to the wordlists folder, relative to this config file.
_user_dict_dir_help: Where per-language personal dictionaries are stored.
Each active language gets its own file, e.g. user_en.json, user_sv.json.
